summary: A heart shield I made for Valentines day...but do to complications couldn't complete until now.
descriptionHtml:
Install with Nexus mod manager or manually buy placing the contents of the zip folder into the data folder of Skyrim enjoy !

The shield can be made at any blacksmith forge with iron smithing requiring one iron ingot and one leather strap.

Textures and model made by me "I know the texture is a little rough its the first time i made one by hand"
author: wootwoot55
